content.question: In the sentence “Their efforts . . . rescue” (paragraph 10), the author integrates a line of reasoning adopted by “industry supporters” into his own argument primarily to

choices.label: describe a method to solve the environmental problems posed by aquaculture
establish that current criticisms of aquaculture are premature
present a view of aquaculture that he seeks to dispute
defend the motives of industry supporters

content.answer: present a view of aquaculture that he seeks to dispute

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
